query:
UPDATE derivations
        SET 
            status_id = $1,  -- BuildPending (7)
            scheduled_at = COALESCE(scheduled_at, NOW())
        WHERE commit_id = $2
        AND cf_agent_enabled = true
        AND derivation_type = 'nixos'
        AND status_id IN ($3, $4)  -- DryRunPending or DryRunComplete
        RETURNING id
